page.title: 12RELIGION
page.content: THE PARK ROAD BAPTIST CHAPEL WAS BUILT IN 1869. ATTACHED IS THE BURIAL GROUND WITH APPROXIMATELY 45 GRAVES. THE CHAPEL ONCE HAD A SIGNIFICANT MEMBERSHIP AND IN 1923 THIS TOTALLED 183. HOWEVER BY 1985 THERE WAS A VERY NOTICEABLE DECLINE WITH A MERE TOTAL OF 9 MEMBERS AND 6 CHILDREN.THE FALL IN MEMBERSHIP DURING THE YEARS MEANT THAT IT COULD NO LONGER FINANCIALLY SUPPORT A MINISTER. TWO OTHER CHAPELS IN SURROUNDING AREAS FACED THE SAME PREDICAMENT SO THEY ALL SHARED ONE MINISTER. TO DATE THE SITUATION HAS FURTHER DETERIORATED AND HAS BECOME DEPENDANT ON LAY PREACHERS TO CONDUCT THE SERVICES HELD EVERY OTHER SUNDAY. OTHER PEOPLE ATTEND THE ESTABLISHED CHURCH - THE CHURCH OF WALES.
